content:
I'm getting a failure on an IG that builds find for me locally. This seems to have coincided with the transition from using Sushi 2.0.1 to 2.1.0 in the build process.

The error is:

Sushi: error Failed to load hl7.fhir.r4.core#4.0.1: The package hl7.fhir.r4.core#4.0.1 could not be loaded locally or from the FHIR package registry. (00:04.0359)
Sushi: error Valid StructureDefinition resource not found. The FHIR package in your local cache may be corrupt. Local FHIR cache can be found at <home-directory>/.fhir/packages. For more information, see https://wiki.hl7.org/FHIR_Package_Cache#Location. (00:04.0408)

http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-mCODE-ig/branches/precancerous/failure/build.log
Saul Kravitz has marked this topic as unresolved.
